#### Welcome to Medicine Hat College's Volkswagen E-Golf Data Explorer!

The Explore tab lets you look at all the data we've collected:

1. Use the controls in the grey box to choose the variables you want displayed on the graph.

3. Click the "Split Groups" checkbox to to create a graph for each group within the group variable selcted.

5. Click the "BOOKMARK" button to generate a url which contains the current state of the tool.
